channel.title: 70 Def Requirement doesn't work! [HELP]

item.title: 70 Def Requirement doesn't work! [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:4, topic:355509”]startsWith is case sensitive, it would be

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Armadyl Chestplate")) { return 70; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Armadyl Plateskirt")) { return 70;[/quote]

Thanks, it worked.

Read full topic

item.title: 70 Def Requirement doesn't work! [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

deathschaos9:

Did you define Armadyl Plateskirt and Armadyl Chestplate in item.cfg?

Yes I did. Here is the code for them in item.cfg:

item = 7608 Armadyl_Chestplate Powerful_Armadyl. 100000000 10000000 100000000 -7 -7 -7 -15 33 56 48 61 70 57 0 1 item = 7609 Armadyl_Plateskirt Powerful_Armadyl. 50000000 50000000 50000000 -6 -6 -6 -10 20 32 26 34 40 33 0 1

item.title: 70 Def Requirement doesn't work! [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I want to have my full Armadyl 70 defence.
So, I go to “wearing.java”.
I write this in the def method:

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Armadyl chestplate")) { return 70; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Armadyl plateskirt")) { return 70;

I try to put my Armadyl with 1 def and it doesn’t say that I need 70 def! I can still wear Armadyl at level 1.

Please, help me.
Thanks.

Read full topic
